field.email.helper: A link to a registration form will be sent to this address.
field.email.label: Email
submit.error.text: An unknown error occurred during registration form creation. You may try again later.
submit.error.title: Registration failed.
success.main: A link was sent to {user}. This link contains a one-time temporary form to complete your registration.
success.sub: If you fail to open and complete the form in time, you can always ask for a new one from this page. You may now leave this page, or proceed to login once you have completed your registration.
success.title: Registration form created!
title: Register
